Verses: 1 gnaanam Than Veettaik Katti, Than Ezhu Thoongalaiyum Siththirantheerththu,
2 than Kozhuththa Jandhukkalai Adiththu, Thraatcharasaththai Vaarththuvaiththu, Than Pojanapandhiyai Aayaththappaduththi,
3 than Panividaikkaarigalai Anuppi, Pattanaththin Uyarndha Medaigalinmel Nindru Kooppittu,
4 buththiyeenanai Nokki: Evan Pedhaiyo Avan Ivvidaththil Varakkadavan.
5 neengal Vandhu En Appaththaip Pusiththu, Naan Vaarththa Thraatcharasaththaip Paanampannungal.
6 pedhaimaiyai Vittu Vilagungal, Appozhudhu Pizhaiththiruppeergal; Buththiyin Vazhiyile Nadavungal Endru Vilambugiradhu.
7 pariyaasakkaaranaik Kandikkiravan Lachchaiyadaigiraan; Dhunmaarkkanaik Kandikkiravan Thannaik Karaippaduththikkollugiraan.
8 pariyaasakkaaranaik Kadindhukollaadhe, Avan Unnaip Pagaippaan; Gnaanamullavanaik Kadindhukol, Avan Unnai Nesippaan.
9 gnaanamullavanukkup Podhagampannu, Avan Gnaanaththil Theruvaan; Needhimaanukku Ubadhesampannu, Avan Arivil Viruththiyadaivaan.
10 karththarukku Bayappadudhale Gnaanaththin Aarambam; Parisuththarin Arive Arivu.
11 ennaale Un Naatkal Perugum; Un Aayusin Varushangal Viruththiyaagum.
12 nee Gnaaniyaanaal Unakkendru Gnaaniyaavaai; Nee Pariyaasakkaaranaanaal Neeye Adhin Bayanai Anubavippaai Endrum Sollugiradhu.
14 aval Than Veettuvaasarpadiyilum Pattanaththin Medaigalilum Aasanampottu Utkaarndhu,
15 thangal Vazhigalai Nokki Nere Pogum Vazhippokkaraip Paarththu:
16 evan Pedhaiyo Avan Ivvidaththil Varakkadavan Endrum,
17 madhiyeenanai Nokki: Thiruttuththanneer Thiththikkum, Andharangaththil Pusikkum Appam Inbamaayirukkum Endrum Sollik Kooppidugiraal.
18 aayinum Mariththavargal Avvidaththil Undendrum, Avaludaiya Virundhaaligal Naragapaadhaalangalil Kidakkiraargalendrum Avan Ariyaan.
